title: I like how kha zix gets buffed and wukong nerfed.
body:
Wukong was nerfed because "one shot from invisibility with no counterplay". Remind me again what does kha do ?
Also theres no wukong players in high elo, whereas kha zix has and he was already a good champ before that. And he has tools to escape after one shot, where wukong most of the time cant.
If you say wukong has aoe, yeah but you wont die unless he uses EQ on you too.
Same thing with rengar/kayn/talon, they all do a better job than wukong and yet they get buffed in the same patch wukong got back to back nerfs.

Then, when wukong mains say we want a rework to make him more skilled, riot says china doesn't so fuck you.
Ok, lemme wait another 4 years for wukong to be in the patch notes.

For all you people under the impression that Wukong is a bruiser. First of all, Wukong is a bad bruiser. To be played bruiser, Wukong requires one of 4 win conditions:
1. Jungle Pressure, and a lot of it
2. Braindead enemy laner
3. God-like skills in comparison to enemy laner
4. Extremely favorable matchup
The reason being that Wukong is missing the sustain of a bruiser, the defensive steroid of a bruiser, the base stats(?) of a bruiser, the ability of a bruiser to scale past out of his terrible lane phase, a bruiser's high base damages, and 
All of the above, combined with his high AD ratios, make him far better as an assassin than as a bruiser. Don't get me wrong, bruiser is viable, but extremely conditional.

They key word here is "supposed" to. The problem here is, that Wukong is very different from your conventional bruiser. Most bruisers have some sort of 'Gimmick' to their kit. Darius bleed, Fiora vitals, Garen villain, Olaf and attack speed... the list goes on. Wu has none of that, and also none of the sustain most bruisers have. Unlike most other bruisers, he has terrible trade patterns, is easily bullied out of lane, AND is heavily outscaled. Add to the fact that Riot loves nerfing base damages instead of ratios on him and we see the outcome. Bad bases and very good scaling. idk what Riot expected, but Wu players like to take advantage of his scalings and build assassin. He's a much better assassin than bruiser, and the only time you will ever build bruiser on the champ is if 4 of the enemy team are bulky or if your team lacks a frontline.
